sentences.sContent: Often the initial topology does not call for another intermediary, so this becomes a good choice.
sentences.sContent_eng: Often the initial topology does not call for another intermediary, so this becomes a good choice.
sentences.sCn: 通常，最初的拓扑结构并不要求另外的中介，因此这成为了一个好的选择。

synos.tran: 中间人；仲裁者；调解者；媒介物

phrases.pCn: 金融中介机构；金融中介人；金融媒介物

remMethod.val: inter(在…之间) + medi(中间) + ary → 中间人

words.tran: 中间的；对话的；对话体的
调解；仲裁；调停；作中间人

trans.tranCn: 中间人；仲裁者；调解者；媒介物
trans.tranOther: a person or organization that tries to help two other people or groups to agree with each other
